news_header: A group of 288 Romanian mercenaries, led by Horatiu Potra, returned from the conflict zone in the Democratic Republic of Congo, where many were captured by the M23 militia.
news_original_title: Romania, DRC: Who is mercenary leader Horatiu Potra?
news_text: Potra, who has a controversial background and connections to far-right politics in Romania, has been under investigation for various activities, including arms possession and alleged coup plans. His mercenaries were often mistaken for members of the Russian Wagner Group. The return of these men was facilitated by international negotiations involving the UN and the Romanian Foreign Ministry.
